models.user: A person who uses the system to analyse their triage calls. Contains basic profile information for authentication.
models.formState: Represents the current state of an authentication form (idle, loading, success, or error).
models.validationErrors: Collection of inline error messages shown when form validation fails.

relationships: Each form has one formState that controls its behaviour
ValidationErrors are displayed inline next to their corresponding form fields

error.error: Invalid email or password. Please try again.

validationErrors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validationErrors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
validationErrors.invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
validationErrors.emailAlreadyExists: An account with this email already exists
validationErrors.resetEmailSent: If an account exists with this email, you'll receive a password reset link shortly.
validationErrors.resetLinkExpired: This password reset link has expired. Please request a new one.
validationErrors.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now sign in.
